summary: Six women attempt to make it in current day Tokyo, living their everyday lives the best and worst they can. For them, every little moment becomes a ritual of the ordinary and the exciting, ... See full summary »
cast: Yuka Itaya|Haruka Igawa|Shôzô Endô|Manami Honjô|Shinichirô Ishikawa|Teruyuki Kagawa|Keishi Nagatsuka|Ayano Nakamura|Hidetoshi Nishijima|Satoru Sakamoto|Son Seika|Ikuno Takagi
title: Tokyo.Sora
